snippet: Chun Wook-pyo escaped from North Korea last month, more than four decades after his abduction at sea.
abstract: Chun Wook-pyo, South Korean fisherman who was kidnapped and taken to North Korea four decades ago, successfully flees his captors and returns home.
lead_paragraph: Chun Wook-pyo escaped from North Korea last month, more than four decades after his abduction at sea.

headline.main: South Korean Fisherman’s Escape From North Is Confirmed
headline.print_headline:
South Korea: Fisherman Escapes North
More Than 40 Years After Kidnapping
